casebody.data:
Michael NEWHOUSE, Appellant, v. FORD MOTOR COMPANY, Appellee. No. 01-2866. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Submitted Nov. 30, 2001. Decided Dec. 13, 2001.

Before BOWMAN, BRIGHT, and LOKEN, Circuit Judges.

[UNPUBLISHED]

PER CURIAM.

Michael Newhouse appeals the district court’s1 order granting Ford Motor Company’s motion to enforce a settlement agreement. Because Newhouse failed to carry his burden to show that his attorney *695lacked authority to enter into the settlement, see Turner v. Burlington N. R.R. Co., 771 F.2d 341, 345-46 (8th Cir.1985), we affirm the judgment of the district court. See 8th Cir. R 47B. We deny appellee’s pending motion as moot.

. The Honorable Howard F. Sachs, United States District Judge for the Western District of Missouri.
